snippet.title: Trappist - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Trappist gameplay trailer!

Explore the Trappist-1 solar system and establish thriving colonies. Uncover the mysteries of Trappist in this story-driven #citybuilder.

Available now on Itch.io:
https://sirrahdev.itch.io/trappist

Wishlist on Steam:
https://s.team/a/2769820

#indiedev | #indiegames | #gamedev | #indiedeveloper | #games | #strategygames | #pcgaming | #cozygamer | #resourcemanagement | #madewithunity | #space

Music is "A Long Way" by Andrew Sitkov, Muz Station Productions

Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SirrahGames
